description: This file implements functions related to the Http Mbo Identity Object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization. It appears to be part of a larger HTTP server or component framework, specifically handling object lifecycle management for the identity aspect of the Mbo.

classes.name: HTTP_MBO_IDENTITY_OBJECT
classes.description: Struct representing the Http Mbo Identity Object, including member variables and function pointers related to its lifecycle.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpMboIdtCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Http Mbo Identity Object, setting up its function pointers and contextual handles.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboIdtRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Http Mbo Identity Object by freeing associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboIdtEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls all necessary subordinate objects or components required by this object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboIdtInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the object, including setting function pointers and default values, after creation.
